mixed-citation.named-content: Tafana oliviae De Oliveira & Brescovit 2021, sp. nov.
mixed-citation.article-title: Taxonomic revision and cladistic analysis of ghost spiders of the genus Tafana Simon, 1903 (Araneae: Dionycha, Anyphaenidae), with the descriptions of twelve new species

tp:treatment-sec.p: ARGENTINA • 1 ♂ ; Misiones , Santa María ; [ 27°56′04″ S ; 55°24′25″ W ]; Nov–Dec. 1913 ; M.J. Viana leg.; MACN 3565 • 1 ♀ ; Cataratas del Iguazú [ near Puerto Iguazú ]; [ 25°41′43″ S , 54°26′12″ W ]; Nov. 1970 ; M.E. Galiano leg.; MCZ .
